meanings.definition: Having small, raised bumps or knots
meanings.sent1: The blanket felt nubby against my skin.
meanings.sent2: She liked the nubby texture of the sweater.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tongue felt nubby as it licked my hand.
meanings.sent4: The nubby surface of the tree bark provided a good grip.
meanings.sent5: The nubby carpet made walking barefoot enjoyable.

meanings.definition: A fabric with a rough, textured surface
meanings.sent1: She chose a nubby fabric for the sofa.
meanings.sent2: The nubby material of the curtains added depth to the room.
meanings.sent3: The nubby fabric reminded her of a cozy winter sweater.
meanings.sent4: The nubby texture of the rug resembled tiny pebbles.
meanings.sent5: The nubby blanket kept her warm on chilly nights.

meanings.definition: A small, rough bump or knot on a surface
meanings.sent1: He felt a nubby on the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: The nubby on the wall caught her attention.
meanings.sent3: The nubby on the banana made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: The nubby on the fabric snagged the thread.
meanings.sent5: She traced her finger over the nubby on the rock.
